body:
Dear Radiancers,


I have recently installed the LNBL precompiled binaries for Mac on a
Mountain Lion OS 10.8; and when trying to get the solar intensity of the
sky (*gendaylit - blah blah blah -O1*) it says "Segmentation fault: 11".
After that, I tried using the HEAD release from some days ago, on Linux,
and same deal "Segmentation fault (core dumpted)".


The same sky, without the O option does not return an error, but whenever I
put O1, O2 or O0, it throws back a segmentation fault.


Is this a known issue? what can I do to avoid it?


THANKS VERY MUCH


German Molina
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2013-January/009163.html).</sup>
